Just to make sure it wasn't my speakers and not the tv –'cause then I gotta return it– I plugged my external speakers into my previous tv; they worked fine on that tv. I plugged them back into this Seiki tv and they sounded horrible again.I gave this product 2 stars because I don't like how it's been manufactured. Also, for anyone considering buying: Their website a "Contact Us" option. I tried contact them via email, no response; I have tried contacting them via phone, no possible way of talking to a person –at least not for me. So, beware of that.Conclusion:This product will give you many inputs, more than many other TVs, and nice 1080p (1930x1080) visuals for a low price.However, the sound quality of the internal speakers, as well as the inputs for external speakers really lack in quality creating that sort of sizzling sound one hears when something is turned up too high regardless how low the volume is.And, if you are to have a problem with the product, the only real option is to return it on Amazon (given that you bought it off Amazon, of course).I would recommend this tv to someone who doesn't care too much for sound quality –assuming it to be an older person who is not too tech savy– or possibly to someone with a Playstation 3 and an external speaker system that supports Digital Optical Audio because, then, it is possible to plug a such cable from the Playstation 3 directly to the speaker system and selecting that option on the Playstation3 system completely bypassing the tv regarding sound. In other words, the sound quality on this tv makes it unbearable for avid gamers or avid movie watchers.End note: Not just music sounds bad on this tv. While playing games, every sound sizzles. And, whether it be a game or movie, voices are the worst. imagine someone turning the volume high as possible whenever someone talk even though the volume is relatively low.One more thing: if you buy this tv, don't throw away the box 'cause it'll cost you, possibly, $100 to have one custom made at UPS.I hope, whether you buy or not, that this helps anyone considering this tv.

Reviews.Title: Cheap TV and Defective - do not buy
Reviews.Author: Jithu
Reviews.Content: Bought this item in November 2012 and returning it in January 2013.There are white dots appearing on the TV and Seiki said it cannot be repaired.It could only be returned but I have to pay the return shippping (What the heck) and they will replace it with a refurbished TV.Will put more bucks to buy a branded one.

Reviews.Title: Not Bad
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: Great product for the price. The audio is not the greatest but I will see how a surround sound system does

Reviews.Title: good product for the price
Reviews.Author: greeneye
Reviews.Content: good picture for basic tv usersfair sounddecent pricesound bar would make this the ideal TV for me

Reviews.Title: Seiki TV
Reviews.Author: AlF
Reviews.Content: The clearity is great, the sound is great.  You cannot go wrong with the purchase of this TV.  AlF Bartlesville, OK

Reviews.Title: Red Dot, Anyone?
Reviews.Author: klr4isu
Reviews.Content: We're overall pretty pleased with this purchase. Only complaint is there seems to be an odd red dot on the screen towards the bottom right-hand side. It's really weird. Just showed up one day. Not bothersome unless we're watching a dark-lit movie. And it's not annoying enough for me to contact Amazon about it yet. Will update later if it becomes worse.

Reviews.Title: I really love it!
Reviews.Author: shirleyzhouzhou
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical when I bought it since I don't know the brand and it's ridiculously cheap. I am quite picky about screen quality and sound, but I was on a tight budget, so I bought it anyway. It works great- looks and sounds the same as the expansive ones my friends and parents got. I have been promoting "my new cheap awesome 46 inch TV" in every single friends and family gatherings and they are getting a bit annoyed now since most of them spent a fortune on theirs. :)I am really glad I gave it a try. Trust me, it's great!

Reviews.Title: Was hoping to like it....
Reviews.Author: D. Silva "danjax007"
Reviews.Content: I was excited to get a 46 inch tv for the price I got it for after missing out on a few other black friday deals and decided to take a chance on this tv with a brand name I've never heard of.  Sadly, I got what I paid for.  While the tv itself was light and the picture on the screen was good at first, it didn't last.  Within 2 weeks after receiving it, I started seeing lines on the top of the tv.  Pretty soon the whole upper third of the screen had lines running across which would go away sometimes but always come back and ruin the picture.  Decided to not take a chance and send it back while I was still within the return period.

Reviews.Title: really easy to set up  - great picture
Reviews.Author: Robyn Keeney
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my bedroom and was a little nervous about setting it up by myself, but it was much easier than I thought. There are just a few screws to put into the base and then you're good to go.  I think it took all of 15 minutes, and I'm not very handy with tools.  I think the picture looks great, and I am actually considering getting a second TV just the same for my living room.  It's a great price for a good sized TV.

Reviews.Title: Seiki 46" TV
Reviews.Author: Not2bad570
Reviews.Content: l choose this rating as the coaxial cable connector on the TV is loose, and if it moves just a little bit l lose the TV signal, so l have to wiggle it to get the picture back.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: D. de Gannes "Dilly"
Reviews.Content: My only issue with this television doesnt have much volume - but it works well otherwise and I love my purchase.

Reviews.Title: This beats the Samsung we took  back.
Reviews.Author: I bleed green more
Reviews.Content: Color is great  have no issues  this thing really  has us loving  watching HD  its gorgeous  I say  try it you will love it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Mychal Doering
Reviews.Content: Love it.  It was a great price, works like it says it would and looks great also!  I would buy it again!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV, and we couldn't beat the price.  We bought it as a Christmas gift to ourselves, and couldn't be happier.  We highly recommend the TV!

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: David Hulsman
Reviews.Content: Was leery about the name but was absolutely astounded by the quality of picture. Compared to name brand 46" class screens I have seen in friends and family homes this is as good or better picture. As others have stated the sound is not great but with the money you save on this I paid $280, buy a sound bar or inexpensive  home theatre setup.

Reviews.Title: What to do?
Reviews.Author: Aahz
Reviews.Content: TV is great.  Love the picture, and the price I could not pass up.  However, the audio does not work on the AV port.  I have a surround sound in the room, so I can work around it.  I called Seiki tech support, and they told me to deal with Amazon.  That only took 45 mins to get that answer.  I have not decided if I am going to return it or not.  Seems like a lot of hassle for a problem I can work around.

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: james roberts cusentino
Reviews.Content: This 46 inch LED HDTV is incredible! The picture is very crisp and clear. I couldn't belive how affordable it was! I wasn't familiar with Seiki, but I'm very impressed!

Reviews.Title: Good cyber Monday quality.
Reviews.Author: Sheri
Reviews.Content: Ordered on cyber Monday after checking out lots of reviews.  Some of the reviews were negative regarding sound quality but we have surround and haven't even hooked it up.  The sound is fine.  Great deal.  Hope it lasts.

Reviews.Title: Best Black Friday purchase ever
Reviews.Author: Clinton Lingo
Reviews.Content: It was delivered very quickly.Setup consisted of turning it on.My xbox connected instantly. Scanning for local cable channels took about 5-10 minutes but it picks them up clearly. I love all the options as far as ports go. It has a bright and crisp picture.The only complaint I have is the volume of the speakers......but let's be honest, no one expects much from thin LED TV speakers.Overall, very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: S. Smith
Reviews.Content: I was a little leary about the brand but I've had it now for over a month & the picture & sound are unbelievable.  For the price I paid at Amazon, it is truly astounding !

Reviews.Title: Great Cheap TV
Reviews.Author: Atl Fool
Reviews.Content: Amazon, as usual, does the good on packing & shipping. It's working fine & over what I expected. I don't mean it can compete w/ high-end LEDs. But, for <$350 (no s/h & tax), where can you get a over 40-inch 1080p LED? As long as it works like currently, I will be very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Excellent price for product
Reviews.Author: new basement
Reviews.Content: Very good value and we would definitely buy it again.  Very easy to set up and has a good picture for the price.  We were afraid that the audio would suffer at this price, but the audio is very good.

Reviews.Title: low tech guy - nice buy
Reviews.Author: michael rochon
Reviews.Content: i wanted something big and low tech that would display a large picture. some of the comments about sound volume are true - but i live in an apartment so no need to get a big "boom" anyways. love it. amazing price.

Reviews.Title: Who Knows?
Reviews.Author: lavonna starnes
Reviews.Content: The screws to the base were missing.  They cannot be replaced by Seiki or Amazon.  So basically I'm stuck with a pill of worthless tv.  Amazon will refund the money, but cannot replace the tv itself.  This was the first time for me buying something on Cyber Monday.  Did not turn out well.

Reviews.Title: fair for the mone
Reviews.Author: Charlie Brown "Tolkien took over my world at ...
Reviews.Content: It is fine for the kids to use but after having a Panasonic Plasma I am not impressed. Would not buy again. I would save the money and buy Panasonic.

Reviews.Title: Great deal! Great product
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Vail
Reviews.Content: Great TV. I was a bit timid about buying a brand that I had never heard of before, but Im very glad I did!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Deal!!!
Reviews.Author: Luis Torres
Reviews.Content: TV shipped quickly and was received shorter than expected. Xbox 360 looks good on it. Great item for the price!

Reviews.Title: Great tv for a great price!
Reviews.Author: lorie sipps
Reviews.Content: Large screen tv. Very affordable! Great quality for the money. Very happy with this purchase and so is my husband.

Reviews.Title: Seiki se461ts - great led HDTV for price
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: Great tv, nothing to complain about for the price. Everything works great. Has all the latest connection ports, light in weight, looks great mounted because it is so thin. Would reccomend.

Reviews.Title: seiki
Reviews.Author: Grannie Annie
Reviews.Content: For a TV I'd never heard of it is a great item. we installed it ourselves and it working perfect.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Carol
Reviews.Content: This TV was great when it arrived from Amazon, the color was really good, and the sound was better than we expected based on the reviews we read, after almost 4 weeks the picture started to black out, the sound stayed on but no picture, we could bring back the picture but it kept doing it, so we packed it up and shipped it back, what a disappointment, we really liked the TV and this may have been a flaw in the TV we had since no other review mentioned this problem.If no one else has had this problem we would try another TV from Seiki, for the price this was more than we expeced.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Michelle E Jacoby
Reviews.Content: So far this TV has exceeded my expectations. I am a first time TV buyer and needed a nice size tv at a good price and good quality. My 7 year old daughter and I set this up on the stand plugged it in, hooked up the cables and Wii and it worked!!! After a few minor setting changes (which were all self explanatory) we were up and running. The volume is perfect for our living room which is a decent size but I can see wanted to add speakers if we use it in a bigger room. 46" is the perfect size.I would highly recommend to anyone who is not a tv cynosure but wants a good easy to use tv. BTW I have had for about 1 month.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tv
Reviews.Author: Christopher J. Reynolds
Reviews.Content: Great pic, fast shipping, I love the brushed metal look of the plastic border, great sound, great price.. You will love this tv

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Jese Avery
Reviews.Content: Affordable and great quality. I bought this tv when it was on sale for cyber Monday deals. It was a great buy and i am very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Decent TV, Shows pretty good image
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I got this and hooked it up to verizon fios with one of the older boxes, just composite video cable. Image is good. It takes around 15 seconds to start. I have no complaints so far.

Reviews.Title: No complaints
Reviews.Author: JJ
Reviews.Content: The price for this TV was unbeatable! It's quality is great, we watch everything on the HD channels and use the HDMI cable on our PS3. Our television and gaming experience are outstanding and I see no flaws with this TV. I would recommend this product. (Just make sure you have an HDMI cable!)

Reviews.Title: Excellent product for the money
Reviews.Author: John L. Coticchio "Music man"
Reviews.Content: I usually buy the big name brand appliances. I tried this due to the price. The picture is as good as my Sony and Samsung TV;s for a fraction of the price. Dont know how the longevity will be...but for the price I could buy 2 of these for the price of a Samsung or Sony. Very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: a steal!!!!
Reviews.Author: bri
Reviews.Content: This was one of my best purchases thus far. The tv is great!!!!  Picture quality and sound are awesome, you can't beat the price of this 46 inch beauty...

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: yadayadayada
Reviews.Content: I found the TV to be really easy to setup and use. The corners of the display, have a bit of white bleed-through on a black background, but I feel that it is due to the nature of being an LED TV.

Reviews.Title: I have not unpacked it yet
Reviews.Author: John Kenny
Reviews.Content: I have one of this brand an I am very happy with it, I bought this one for a house down south an I have not unpacked it yet

Reviews.Title: all around great tv
Reviews.Author: adam
Reviews.Content: esay to put together. bright crisp picture. sound is ok. very slim. cant beat it for the price i wound buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Seiki 46" tv
Reviews.Author: Berryjel
Reviews.Content: It is a very good TV. The picture is bright and the colors are excellent. The one thing that I don't like is the standard zoom still looks stretched. Other than that's the TV is great.

Reviews.Title: I Love It!
Reviews.Author: Karen Carpenter
Reviews.Content: I love this TV.  I purchased it for myself for X-Mas & it came delievered in excellent time & packaging!!  Just got it hooked up the other day & it's working Great!  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Excellent !
Reviews.Author: Jayne Stiles
Reviews.Content: This is a great buy !! I do not have any complaints this is a really nice tv. I do understand about the volume not going up very loud...

Reviews.Title: Love the tv
Reviews.Author: nanny
Reviews.Content: We r so far thrilled with it it works great n looks great n no problems so far so we r very pleased

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: Barbara Pedwell
Reviews.Content: Great picture, excellent value! The sound is a little low but overall I am just as happy with this tv as with my much more expensive Samsung!

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Alfonso
Reviews.Content: Outsatnding! very great picture, very light weight easy to hang on wall and impressed with the price. I wwould tell a friend.

Reviews.Title: led tv
Reviews.Author: Dukem
Reviews.Content: Had TV a little over a month. Has worked great. With digital signal very clear picture. Great sound for this price of  TV. Recommended by me.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: Liquesence
Reviews.Content: After finally deciding to upgrade from a SD Tube TV, i purchased this on my birthday (for myself) on Black Friday, 2012. Thanks to the Great Rainforest, i got next day shipping for a few bucks, and had the TV waiting.A few days later I noticed that the price had dropped another $50 on the site, and thanks to the Great Rainforest's price-match guarantee (on their own TV products, as well), I was refunded the difference.I had never heard of Seiki, but after a little research and a few reviews, I figured 40% off a flatscreen HDTV, what the heck.Installation was pretty simple: Plug in, run HDMI from DVD Player, run audio to receiver. I have a home theater system, so I can't comment on the speakers, but the picture is great coming from a Blu-Ray player. I didn't even need to adjust the factory settings except to switch it to movie mode (all I watch on it are films [man-cave]), and switch it to surround sound (so the audio would export to the receiver).Picture, Saturation, Contrast, Resolution, ETC are all fine. Exceptionally fine.It's been a month now, everything is still fine, with no issues at all, and the picture is still great. Even though only 60Hz, i can't tell a difference in action sequences (i don't watch much action, or sports).Great TV, Great Price. Easy Installation. Happy Viewer.We'll see how long it goes strong.

Reviews.Title: Picture is Excelent, remote control is basic, sound is weak
Reviews.Author: LessonLearned
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is excellent, the screen is bright and color is very good quality.  When used as a PC monitor the detail is great.  The remote control is very small with only a mininmal amount of selections possible.  The remote is directional it must be pointed directly at the TV to function, (I had expected better).  The sound is only adequate, but this is to be expected as the speakers are small and are directed down and to the back.  The pedestal does not have a built in swivel.Overall the set is good value for a budget TV..

Reviews.Title: Seiki SE461TS TV
Reviews.Author: Michael R. Doetkott
Reviews.Content: Sound quality and picture image are not as clear as an LG but for the money it is a great TV

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Mindy McMann
Reviews.Content: we bought this because of the great price and good reviews. We love it! Wish we would have bought 2!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: P. Moreland
Reviews.Content: Got this on Cyber Monday for $340 with free two day shipping. Works and looks as good as my $350 32" vizio. No dead pixels, tons of inputs, screen is super light and thin. Switching inputs can be a pain, as my cable remote will only bring up the list, and not change channels.Overall a great tv.

Reviews.Title: Happy buyer
Reviews.Author: Saleendave2000
Reviews.Content: The tv was a great buy for the buck. Not a well known name brand, but a good tv. The only thing that needs improvement is the sound. Volume doesn't get much louder whether it's on 25 or 75 sounds the same.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Enoch A. Smith "Aaron Smith"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV as a Christmas present for my parents and they're LOVING it. The design is attractive without looking too cheap or flashy, it has enough outlets to hook up to their cable box, PS3, and combo DVD/VCR, and it's simple enough to navigate.The one major con I've discovered is that it has no headphone outlet. For many people with regular home theater sound systems, this won't be a big issue, but if you want to listen to the TV late at night without waking people up or to plug in a set of computer speakers (like my parents were using for this TV), you'll need to make sure that either your speaker system has its own headphone out or buy an analog-to-headphone adapter. Of course, the sound from the built-in speakers is bad enough that you'll probably want a dedicated sound system, anyway.To sum up:Pros:- This is about the lowest price you're going to find on an HDTV this price- It won't have every single bell or whistle that a more expensive TV would have, but it has everything you really needCons:- Poor sound from built-in speakers- No headphone jackIn sum, if you don't have thousands of dollars to spend on the best HDTV, I'd highly recommend this one. No, it's not perfect, but this is as good as you're going to get for a new HDTV at this price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Treue
Reviews.Content: This is the first flat screen I have ever purchased and i am very satisfied. Not only was the setup extremely easy, the television itself is beautiful.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: John S
Reviews.Content: This tv works great and was completely worth the money. It's been three weeks since I got this tv and have had 0 issues with it.

Reviews.Title: tv review
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Brian Richard Johnson"
Reviews.Content: not bad for what i paid for it has a few bugs but it is acceptable cant expect to much

Reviews.Title: We love it
Reviews.Author: Daniel A. Borgers "Nephew"
Reviews.Content: It set up in just a couple minutes.  I turned it upside down, installed the base and plugged it into our cable box and DVD player in under 5 minutes.  The picture is great.  Can't beat it for the price.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV at an awesome price
Reviews.Author: Evan Durgin
Reviews.Content: I paid $350 for this TV during a black Friday deal in 2012. I had never heard of Seiki, but the reviews looked good and the price was unbeatable.I am happy with the TV. Setup was easy. Yes the base stand is a little wobbly if you move the TV, but it does not affect anything and holds the TV just fine. I do not worry that it will just break or anything. Maybe a concern for people with small children though.Sound quality: I have the TV hooked to surround sound speakers, so I cannot comment on this.Picture quality: Resolution is awesome. Contrast and color depth are decent, I've seen better, but this does the job well.Very happy with the TV so far especially for the price. I would recommend it if you are on a budget.Only complaint: Switching between inputs seems to take longer than my other TV as it changes resolution modes goes to blue screen. Still only takes 3-5 seconds, so not even that bad.

Reviews.Title: Right TV Price; for the right Time; for the right Place
Reviews.Author: Dave in Cleveland
Reviews.Content: This product was purchased for my finished basement for the workout area.  Honestly, I have not heard of this brand before, but the TV had overall good reviews and for the price, I did not want to pass it up.  Through Amazon, this TV was about $130 less than the next best price.  Setting-up to cable and peripherals was cake, no problem.  The stand was a bit temperamental to screw on, and the quality of the stand appears flimsy; it would also be helpful if the TV stand swiveled like so many at the size of 46" do.  Sound and TV picture are okay; they do not compare to my Samsung upstairs, but again, for the price and the location of the TV, this was a great buy.

Reviews.Title: It's ok
Reviews.Author: Dave Hall
Reviews.Content: Rcvd the TV and set it up fairly easyily.  Noticed right off the bat that there was a dead pixel.  Now if you check the Seiki website you see a video on there of the quality control engineers closely examining the screens with loops for dead pixels, i guess they missed this one.Sound is what is to be expected from such a slim TV, it's fine, its our bedroom tv so we usually have it on 6-7Stand is flimsy and tv will fall over if knocked but with such a slim TV it is better to mount it.I also have a gripe in that our remote from our cable provider does not work on this tv so we need to use 2 remotes.  However for the price that i paid (350.00) i have a decent 46" LED TV, can't really complain all that much.Also one other minor problem is that there is some LED bleed in the corners....but like i said this is a bedroom TV and the price cannot be beat.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV
Reviews.Author: CLAY THOMAS
Reviews.Content: A GREAT TV FOR THE PRICE REMOTE IS NOT USER FRIENDLY BUT TV IS GREAT IF HAD A BETTER REMOTE WOULD GIVE IT 5 STARS.

Reviews.Title: works great for the price
Reviews.Author: poptarts123
Reviews.Content: Thuis product works wellvery thingood picturelittle bright at corners due to edge lighting.seems to work well.just dont expect any special features like internet or 3d.I got the apple tv hooked up and works well with it.

Reviews.Title: VERY GOOD
Reviews.Author: BILL DRUMMER
Reviews.Content: VERY GOOD PICTURE  FOR A 60 HZ TV.......FEEDING IT WITH  1080I SATELLITE....JUST A VERY VERY LITTLE SMEARING ON FAST MOVEMENT...YOU HAVE TO REALLY BE LOOKING FOR IT VERY CLOSELY...TO SEE IT,VERY GOOD PICTURE FOR THE MONEYI WAS TOLD IT HAS A SAMSUNG SCREEN IN IT.....BUT PLEASE DON'T QUOTE ME ON THIS...IT DOES LOOK GOOD

Reviews.Title: It only lasted a week
Reviews.Author: steve murzyn
Reviews.Content: I bought this after Thanksgiving and eventually hooked it up a week before Christmas. It had a great picture but I had to rescan several times to recover lost channels. Later in the week the tuner stuck on channel 59, the remote quit working except for the mute botton. The side bottons on the tv did not work so I had to pull the plug to turn it off. I returned the tv. I might try another one because the price is great.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT tv for a low  price
Reviews.Author: Desiree
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for about 2-3 months and I love it! It's super slim, loud, everything is working perfect and I couldn't find a thing to complain about. Other reviews complain about the volume and dead pixels but my TV is fine. At first, yes, the sound does seem like the speakers are in a box but once adjusted it's no issue at all. The sound/appearances are all equivalent to a Samsung, LG, Vizi, and other top of the line televisions. Other than that the stand is hard plastic but it holds and looks nice, the remote is pretty standard nothing fancy but who really uses it? If you have cable there's no need for it. I'm constantly running my Play Station 3 on it and it's top of the line HD! I love the size of the screen for gaming, 46' inches (: The only other "bad" thing I could say, which is really NO big deal, is that when I try to start a game/Netflix the whole screen turns blue for a couple seconds (like it's changing inputs) but it goes away so really quick and it doesn't ever happen after that. Tv shows, games, and Netflix run smooth without interruptions. GREAT TV FOR IT'S PRICE.UPDATE: It is now August 9/20/2013 and I've had my Seiki TV for near a year! It's still running like a charm! I couldn't be more happy because I constantly run gaming systems on it, I have mounted it, watch Netflix, and mess with it. Months ago I did get rid of the annoying blue screen (from changing inputs) by changing a few settings with the "set-up wizard." The blue screen only bugged me because I have an issue with those on my computers but in this case nothing was wrong. I was right it only does that when changing from HDMI 1 etc. etc. but I got the color to black as it seems more suitable. Any who, I haven't had to change any bulbs yet either and I RUN that TV for hours/days straight! I'm so happy with my purchase because of that and I know what a drag it is to change a bulb.. it's costly and pretty hard to do if you don't know what you are doing. Compared to a higher brand name TV those damned things would need a new bulb only after a month or two with HALF of the use I put on my TV! The volume is also still fantastic on my tv, no issues whatsoever. I even figured out why the audio sounds weird in the first place.. it's because the speakers are located on the BACK of the tv on lifted horizontal sides so you don't smash the speakers against a wall. If you mount the tv or even put it on a piece of furniture (dresser/stand/etc.) it may or may not sound weird for a week or two but I can assure you it will sound perfect soon enough. I know this because I constantly switch from my room (Seiki tv) to the living room now (Samsung tv) and they both sound very much a like with perfect quality.

Reviews.Title: Seiki 46-inch LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: ross hettenbach
Reviews.Content: Very prompt delivery. The picture is great on this TV, and it is so slim and light. I would highly recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Tv review
Reviews.Author: War11bvetern
Reviews.Content: Good tv, it's a sister company of LG, the quality of picture is good, 3 hdmi ports... It came in a well packaged box unhindered of any type of scratches or breaks

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Charles Keenan
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV for just shy of a month and so far no problems.The HD is pretty good (I like the quality on our 34 in Samsung better but overall a B+). I have not tried many of the options on this set yet.But on sale for less than $400 including taxes and shipping, how can it be beat!

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture, totally worth the price
Reviews.Author: Steven Woodall
Reviews.Content: Great purchase, wasn't sure about the price, but just watched Bourne Legacy in HD on it, and it was gorgeous.

Reviews.Title: Lo recomiendo se ve muy bien
Reviews.Author: Fernando Gotopo
Reviews.Content: Me gusto el TV, compre el cable HDMI y lo probé. Se ve bastante nitido y full colores.. Lo recomiendo

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Very good picture and value.  Easy set up and doesn't take much more room than the 32 inch TV that it replaces.  It doesn't have all the smart bells and whistles but that isn't what I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: Excellent LED TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Daddy-O
Reviews.Content: I got this to replace my broken DLP.  I paid less than $350, much less than any generic LED 46" TVs available from my local retailers.  After 1 month of use, no problem.  Visual and audio qualities are great for the price.  I have never heard of the Seiki brand, but I don't care at this price point.  Aren't all TVs make in China anyway?

Reviews.Title: Great Christmas Gift!!
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Joseph
Reviews.Content: JUst what I expected, is what I have recieved. I am extremely pleased with this product. This is a Christmas gift from our daughter!!

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Doug Graves
Reviews.Content: Got this TV at a great price and it exceeds my expectations. I highly recommend this TV. I have to use close captions due to hearing loss and the options on CC are great. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Worth every penny and then some!
Reviews.Author: staparker
Reviews.Content: We got this television for our living room to replace an older model tv. It was a Christmas gift for our children as we rarely watch tv in the living room. However, that may change! I love this television! Great picture-yes the sound leaves a little to be desired but it's acceptable for us and if it's not, we can easily purchase a sound bar or surround sound to help it out-especially for the price we paid!

Reviews.Title: seiki tv
Reviews.Author: babygirl
Reviews.Content: I love this tv. I have no problems. This 46 in really looks like 50 in or more. The picture is great. I read reviews about the sound. But I have no problem with the sound. Purchase a soundbar and do not need it. I have this tv in my bedroom and can hear it perfectly at 6. I am older and my daughter has it on 3-4. Sound is great. Great price too. It can not get any better. If I decide to buy another tv, I will purchase this brand again and recommend it to family and friends

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: mildred riggins
Reviews.Content: We love the TV. Can't think of anything negative about it. Great picture quality, just an all around good product..and the price was certainly right.

Reviews.Title: awesome purchase
Reviews.Author: David J Vinson
Reviews.Content: easy to setup, seems sturdy enough even though the base looks fragile,  the pic looks great and sound is adequate,  Never heard of company but they have a future,

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Rqy
Reviews.Content: It is alright tv  especially for the price it seems to work very well.There are things to really like about it, of course there are things that I would like to have, but was not williing to pay the cost to attain, so yes I would purchase another for the same service and especially at the  price.  It is being used on cable and the pic is very good and that is all it is used for and so fills the need I had of a Larger TV for the room

Reviews.Title: Great flat screen for awesome price!
Reviews.Author: FogCityBookGal
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for a big flat screen for a great price, this is it. I've bought two flat screens this year and the one we paid more for is smaller with the same quality picture of this one.This TV was really easy to install and comes with a table stand - not a wall mount.I've watched movies on the system from every angle of the room and the picture is never blurred or distorted. Whether you are watching in widescreen or full screen format, the quality picture is the same. I haven't had any problems with the sound or picture. The only somewhat hard thing to do was to connect the stand - a two person job definitely, but only because someone has to hold the unit while the other person attaches the stand.If you are looking for a flat screen and haven't heard of this brand, you might want to check them out. In my case, it was an excellent find.

Reviews.Title: Skeptical at first, loving it with only one real complaint
Reviews.Author: Bobaluski
Reviews.Content: We got his TV on a cyber monday sale for quite cheap.  It is super thin, the picture is great, and as long as you're using HD input, we don't even notice any blur on live sports stuff, which I was worried about seeing a refresh rate of just 60hz.  The shipping was great, arrived very promptly, the set up/interfacing is easy; the only bummer is the built in speakers are pretty lacking - they go loud enough but the range of sound is quite lacking.  But this is expected of most flat-panel tv's these days anyway.  Will definitely supplement with a sound bar or speaker system soon, that would bring the experience up to 5 stars for sure.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: Shipping was amazingly fast.HD Picture quality Great while SD Picture quality decent.Going to need a different sound source as the tv is too skinny to fit good speakers inside without adding to the cost of the tv.Response time could be a couple ms faster but once again at this price it can't be beat.

Reviews.Title: Sad that I had to send back.
Reviews.Author: Fuzzheadjr "RFC"
Reviews.Content: Amazon Customer Service is outstanding! Just sad I had to send back account something must have been wrong with the main board. Would lose channel(s) and require autoscan once or twice a day to get back. When trying to use favorites seleciton it would lock up and channels would disappear. Did run it for a few days hoping the problem would fix itself.I get over the air signal. I thought the picture was really good. I am not as picky as some people in that regard. The sound, as most people know, would be improved with better external equipment. Doesn't have head phone jack. Didn't try out anything else. Decided against an exchange at this time. Maybe down the road when on sale again, I'll give it another try.

Reviews.Title: 12/13/13 Seiki TV receipt
Reviews.Author: Bret K.
Reviews.Content: Received this product today.  The TV came in no additional packaging and was shipped in it's original box.Box was in overall good condition.I mounted this TV on the wall.  I already had the wall portion of the mount up.  It took approximately 4 minutes to hook the brackets to the back of the TV with the 4 screws that were provided with the TV and were pre-installed in the holes. Installation was quite easy and straight forward.  Be sure you remove the base for the stand in the right location if you want a snug fit to the wall.  There appears to be 2 ways to do this and while it was quite simple I can see someone removing the bottom portion of the stand insert vs. removing the entire insert from the back of the TV itself.The jacks are positioned to the rear so there will be some 'swiveling' or removing this TV from the wall for connecting extra device cables.  Use a mount that allows for this.  The TV is very light and manuvering it for this should not be a problem.Set up was approximately another 2 minutes (+channel search time).  The set up was pre-programmed and led me through step by step once the TV was turned on.Sound was as many have described already.  Ok but not great.  Get a sound bar.I was able to find no issues with burnt out pixels or 'lines' as some have noted.  I also did not find indication ofLED bleed.Picture overall is a 'B' to the Samsung 55" 120hz unit I use in our main living space; but I did not expect a 60hz refresh toperform at that level anyway.  Overall picture is quite good. Very early read, but for the price vs. what I rec'd I would make the purchase again.Beginning to end it took approximately 20 minutes to have the unit in operation and the mess cleaned up.

Reviews.Title: seki tv
Reviews.Author: Patricia Kuchan
Reviews.Content: I like everything about the tv however we can't use a universal remote with this product at it is not listed among the products that can be included

Reviews.Title: Great 46" TV!! Better than what I expected!!
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: My 2 year old 40" has done great since I've had it, but thought it was time to step it up in size!! The 46" definitely did the trick.. Has all the inputs I needed, especially the vga-pc input.. I've been dreaming about a real hd tv.. My 40" was only 720p, and everyone use to say that there wasn't a noticable difference between 720p and 1080p.. Those people are stupid or blind, one or the other.. Cuz there certainly is a huge noticable difference.. The resolution is super clear, and the extra couple inches made a huge difference.. Playing Black Ops on split screen with my wife isn't a problem at all anymore!! I definitely recommend this TV to anyone looking for the upgrade.. The price was great, I got it delivered within 3 days of ordering it, and it's in perfect condition.. I've always been a bit weiry about shipping electronics, especially something like a TV that's so fragile.. Eitherway, well done Seiki.. Next time I upgrade, it'll be for the Seiki 55"!! :)

Reviews.Title: Nothing better
Reviews.Author: Natalie Gerl
Reviews.Content: Other than taking over a week to arrive (I'm very impatient), we have no complaints. Picture is fantastic, set up is relatively easy -although attaching the stand took a couple more minutes than desired. Sound quality, unlike other reviews mentioned, is fine. We don't sit around for hours on end watching tv, though. We do have 2 outside speakers attached when we want to put in a movie, just in case. Normal tv watching sound is about levels 10-15. Blu-Ray looks A-MAZING on this screen. We definitely couldn't find a better deal anywhere at the time of purchase (cyber monday). We don't have cable tv so flipping channels, there's some uncomfortable lag time but that's our only complaint. If you're thinking about buying this - do so and feel comfortable knowing you made an awesome buy.

Reviews.Title: Seiki Purchase
Reviews.Author: Lucy Lou 2 "budget wise"
Reviews.Content: I usually don't buy TV's on-line, I like to actually look at the real product. I usually do price research on-line and then go to the store.  When I saw the Seiki 46" tv on-line, my first thought was, never heard of this brand, then I noticed the price and read all the reviews. I decided for the price, I'm going to take a chance and buy it.  Let me say, I'm so glad I took the chance, we love it. Getting it out of the box was very easy, set up was very easy, turned it on and was very impressed with the picture.  So if you are reading this, take the chance, this is a very nice TV.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: JT
Reviews.Content: I know buying a TV can be a little unnerving to some and chances are that if you are reading this you've already read through countless other reviews as you try and ease your stomach and make a decision. I've had this TV for a little over a week now. It's really light weight and fairly easy to set up. Did so myself. I would like to give one word of caution though. There is "1" screw included in the bag of other screws that is shorter than the rest. Take note to screw that one into cuff between the base and the TV. I half-mindedly proceeded to screw one of the longer screws into it thus breaking the threaded screw guide. Even with that said the stand still works fine. No shaking or risk of falling over. The more important screws all lined up and went in with ease. Just take your time assembling the TV to minimize any unexpected breaks or mistakes.As far as image and sound quality. I have my Digital HD box hooked up to it and all of the shows I've viewed (consisting of sports and the news) come through quite clear. I haven't noticed any grain as I tend to do with TVs located in-store. If there is grain I'm over-looking it, but that's one area I've been quite critical on. Audio comes through in an acceptable manner. No distortion and I have no trouble hearing the TV on its lowest settings. Haven't cranked it all the way up seeing as there is no need for me to do so. So no word on higher level distortion. If the sound quality is less than suffice for you, at this price you can splurge a little more and invest in a nice home audio system.So far I've mainly used this TV to play Black Ops 2. It definitely delivers the resolution I need to stay on top of my game and competitors. I've also used the TV to watch the movie Brave (great movie by the way). There was one scene in the movie where the picture came through a little dark, but I'm not sure if that was an intended result of the movie itself or a "black level" issue. Either way it wasn't bad and we were still able to enjoy the movie.If I was in the process of buying a TV again and the same factors were still present I'd make the same choice. I'm pleased with this TV and it fit well into my budget.

Reviews.Title: Amazing picture but many complications.
Reviews.Author: Jesse C. Newton
Reviews.Content: I had to return the first TV which arrived the day after I ordered it.  I could get no sound using the components set up for my cable.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: Stanley Wilson
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my purchase.  Got it in two days with Prime!  It's easy to set up and the picture is beautiful!  Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Love this TV! Great Value
Reviews.Author: cmchnj
Reviews.Content: This TV arrived 2 days after I ordered it on Cyber Monday. It is light and super thin and easy to set up. After reading the other reviews I thought I would need a soundbar, but I am perfectly happy with the sound as is in my family room setting.  There was some "ghosting" in the picture when I first connected the TV to the cable box using our old style cables. Changed that to HDMI cable hook up and there is no ghosting and the picture is fantastic! It has a standard menu and settings, etc. and is easy to use and was easy to program to the cable remote. This purchase has far exceeded my expectations having only paid $348.00 & free shipping. It was a great deal and I would recommend the TV to anyone looking for a good TV for a little money.

Reviews.Title: Right price and a great product
Reviews.Author: S. Farrell
Reviews.Content: I bought this product mainly for the price and the reviews. I was replacing a 10 year old 42" plasma. I was nervous because I never purchased a television online and I never heard of Seiki. The down and dirty is if you looking for a large 1080p for an amazing price this is a great deal. I won't try and convince you this a product compares to anything high end, but for me it really has worked out great. I could afford an xBox and the TV for what I was willing to pay and couldn't be happier.Pros - Easy set up - Enough inputs for me and my devices - Good picture - a little blue, but is in prod because of the price - Nice looking in my living roomCons - Be careful of the stand, it's a little flimsy. - Volume pretty low, if you want huge sound you'll need to use an ampIn the end, for me you can't beat the price for the quality. I have only had it a week so time will tell but I am really happy with this TV.

Reviews.Title: Off brand bonanza!
Reviews.Author: Stephen Peters
Reviews.Content: I was very leery of buying an off brand tv... Everyone told me to stay away from Element, Dynex, Emerson, Colby, Westinghouse etc... So I was going to spend the $$$ and get a Samsung or LG. But searching amazon I came across this one with great reviews... Seiki!???? What is that? Never heard of them before. Found their official site and they seemed legit. So I bit the bullet since the price was just too good to pass up on a 46" LED TV and the reviews are great. A week later I got this huge package and it was packed very well which is good... Since receiving a tv can be scary.. Who knows how many times it was dropped. Well I got it all set up and hooked my 360 up to it, and just wow... My old tv was a 32" 720p Sharp that was great... But this thing just blows it out of the water... Halo 4 on this thing is epic! The clarity is just amazing... I just really hope it holds up for quite some time. That is my only worry. I only play on the weekends since I work a ton, so it should last quite a while.But overall I am very satisfied! Do not regret buying this TV at all! No issues with it at all thus far...

Reviews.Title: Good quality for the price.
Reviews.Author: Matthew Burian
Reviews.Content: Good quality for the price.  It's not as good as my Samsung, but it didn't cost as much either.  I would it buy again.

Reviews.Title: More than I expected!
Reviews.Author: CAROLYN HORST
Reviews.Content: For the price I didn't expect much, but I was pleasantly surprised. Even though an odd name brand it is as good as my flat screen LG and Sharp TVs! Very easy to assemble - only took a matter of minutes and hooking up the cable was a breeze. You really only want to view HD broadcasts on this TV. Other stations are fine but you won't get the excellent picture quality as with the HD stations. If the special promotion price comes up again, I am certainly going to order another one.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture, Super Bright, Fantastic Value
Reviews.Author: Juan Fermin
Reviews.Content: I bought this unit to replace an HP 42" 720P Plasma that we moved upstairs.  The first thing I noticed was how much brighter the picture was and how incredibly good the contrast ratio's were... WOW!!, I actually had to go into the menu and "soften" the picture, (thought later in the morning with the glare coming in from the window, I put it back to "Normal").  I was actually VERY surprised by this because my Plasma advertised better contrast ratios's than this unit, yet my old plasma unit looks "washed out" compared to the Seiki.  I was concerned that the reflective black screen would end up reflecting the window facing the TV, but it actually wasn't as bad as it was on the Plasma, so that was a relief.I'll sometimes turn off the Denon sound system at night when everyone is sleeping, since the Subwoofer rumbles even at low volumes, and the sound system on the TV sounds fairly clean and crisp, though nothing of course compared to my Denon AV, and I've only used it to listen at low volumes so this isn't really an accurate assesment of the unit's sound capabilities.  Sometimes when watching fast action on the screen, I do see the difference between this 60Hz system and my plasma's 600Hz, I always told myself that If I move to an LCD or LED I'd get at least a 120Hz, but at less than $400.00 I just couldn't pass this unit up.I have a Google TV box and PS3 hooked up to the system, though both first pass through the Denon and Web Browsing is FANTASTIC on the Google TV and games are pretty good on the PS3

Reviews.Title: Very nice TV
Reviews.Author: R. Tucker
Reviews.Content: Off brand electronics can be such a huge gamble, however this TV rated well in reviews so we gave it a try. The picture is great, the sound is good, and the set up was simple and came with stand and proper screws. At 11 cents per KWH, this TV will use about 8 cents worth of electricity in 5 hours. Very energy efficient. And because it's LED, it doesn't get as hot as a regular non-LED LCD TV. Overall, it was a great purchase and we are very happy with it. We got a 4 year extended warranty from SquareTrade just to be safe.The TV is slim and attractive, and you wouldn't know it was an off brand if it didnt say Seiki on it. Overall a highly recommended TV. Our other TV's are Sharp and Vizio, and this offers just as great of a picture as those 2 do.

Reviews.Title: Great deal on a big TV
Reviews.Author: Mikel Estrin "haimishmusic"
Reviews.Content: We bought this from another vendor at a great price plus $100 rebate. I couldn't be happier with this big tv in our bedroom replacing a 28 inch; one. The colors are sharp, the image is crisp, and over the air Hd looks great. I saw a skiing sho and it really looked like a 3d image, though just hd. We got a great deal, and are looking for a 2nd one at that great price ($429 with free shipping and a $100 rebate.) and a mounting bracket for it.

Reviews.Title: Very good except for overscan through hdmi.
Reviews.Author: anthony15
Reviews.Content: Pro:TV has great picture,very large,brush metal looks greatCon:Not deal breaker but tv has overscan which means picture expands outside of the screen around 2 inches on each side which is noticeable on pc through hdmi but i can adjust that in video settings, xbox 360 and ps3 not noticeable just something I think tv shouldnt have issue withCon:Not deal breaker Bad pc monitor cause text is hard to read and havent tried sound but i just hooked up to my pc speakers and sounds great

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price
Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: I can't believe the quality of this tv for 378 dollars. Great picture. Ease of use. Super thin. Buy it you won't regret

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: barb2012
Reviews.Content: I got this as a "deal of the day" for my son for Christmas.  He and his wife are thrilled with it, as it has the quality of a much higher priced TV.  Very easy to set up, good sound, excellent picture!

Reviews.Title: The picture is great, but.......
Reviews.Author: Keith Thompson
Reviews.Content: The picture on this TV is great, and it was programmed to my cable box remote already. I would have gave this 5 stars if it wasn't for the base on this TV, if you tap the TV it would fall over. but if this going on the wall, I recommend this.

Reviews.Title: A GREAT DEAL  with  GREAT PICTURE
Reviews.Author: lyrical
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical buying a tv from a website as I usually like to see the demo in the store before buying. However since it was Amazon, I felt safe as I know if there was a challenge they are the best.One of my main concerns is one of the comments mentioned that there was no code at Directv to combine it with the Directv remote. Let me update you, there is a code , AND IT WORKS :)I think the picture quality is just as good as any tv I looked at Best buy , and the price is the best value on a 46 inch LED I could find anywhere.Thanks AMAZON!

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the price
Reviews.Author: itstephanieduh
Reviews.Content: You can't beat the price for this size TV. We needed to replace our TV and were on a tight budget and found this one for only $348. It was super easy to set up. Picture is good and sound is pretty good once you tweak the settings. Not the best picture out there but you get what you pay for. If you want a super clear picture then I would suggest looking elsewhere. If you need a TV that works good and is easy on the wallet, this is definitely a good choice.

Reviews.Title: just got one
Reviews.Author: Willie
Reviews.Content: I just bought the Seiki 46'' LED HDTV It was a breeze setting it up,the one reviewer was right the stand is extremely flimsy it rocks side to side and makes me nervous the screws that come with it for the stand are too short I  suggest taking one to your local hardware store and buying ones a little longer .other than that It fired right up , it has a extremely bright picture white back grounds light up my whole room but it looks great the color is great the sharpness is great using Century link's high definition channels just got a blue ray player it looks great too its a good t.v. for the money ordered mine on cyber monday it came in 2 days and was free shipping I suggest hooking it up using a HDMI cable- Thanx Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Amazing for the money!!
Reviews.Author: Bryan Morak
Reviews.Content: On the wall for a week now. I'll update if anything changes - 46" LED 60 Hz. I was worried the about the refresh rate but haven't noticed anything bad about the picture. I would put this TV up againts any other TV it has a great clear picture. The sound isn't the best but the price was $348!

Reviews.Title: I love this TV!!!
Reviews.Author: Shelly young "Shelly"
Reviews.Content: Received my TV way before i expected. The picture is very clear and so is the sound quality. This is an excellent buy for the price!!!

Reviews.Title: Not impressed
Reviews.Author: T_AMAZON
Reviews.Content: I just received the Seiki 46 in LED TV and I am not impressed (reviews seemed over optimistic).  When I set it up one of the pixels was stuck and the volume did not work.  They finally started to work after a call to Amazon support.  The TV also has a very cheesy base and bounces when you touch it.  I know this is a cheap TV but I expect it to work and not bounce when someone accidentally touches it.  I am the fence as to whether I am going to keep or return it.  I will check back in later.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: P-Buddy
Reviews.Content: Just got my TV today. So far, I haven't noticed anything negative about it. What a great value and quality picture with no pixelation or blurring of fast moving images. Very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Just ok, at best.
Reviews.Author: C. Duncan "charlie"
Reviews.Content: Hate to say it but i'm not impressed with this tv. If you have to save money when buying a secondary tv, then do this. The pic is passable. The sound is bad. Get a soundbar. This tv just isn't in the class of the well known brands. I bought a 42 panasonic when i returned this set and the difference is startling. I wanted to like this set because it was a gift to someone, but if you are looking for a great tv, this one doesn't cut it. i'm glad i returned the gift and got this one instead. they are grateful because of the difference !If you are on a really tight budget, you'll survive on this one.

Reviews.Title: Great for the money
Reviews.Author: Sethry
Reviews.Content: This is my secondary HDTV for a bedroom. For the price - I knew I wasn't buying perfection, but I am extremely pleased with the TV. The bezel has a nice brushed metal matte finish to it which I noticed right out of the box. The picture quality, brightness, and color again, are not perfect, but great for the price. Sound quality - not great, but that seems to be a common theme among all HDTVs. One thing that was EXTREMELY important to me was avoiding what has become known as the "Soap Opera Effect" or motion smoothing. That totally drives me crazy, but appears to be an issue only on LEDs with 120hz or great refresh rates. Because of that, I am really glad that this is only 60hz. Movies still look like film and not a home movie!Overall, I'm super happy. If you are extra critical of some of the technological details, by all means spend more money and go with a big name brand. But if you're just looking for a great, low priced, HDTV, (that is pretty big for the price) I highly recommend this.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Bryan Amerling
Reviews.Content: This TV was my first foray into the HD world (just wasn't a priority for a while).  I knew what I wanted, namely a 40+ inch, LED, 1080i TV.  I was looking at several higher end name brands but the price range just wasn't what I wanted.  When I came across this Seiki, I did some research and saw that almost all of the reviews for this product on multiple sites (not just Amazon) were very positive.  My brother, who sold TV's retail for a while, said he had really good luck with off brands in the past and said with the price, I should take the chance.Well, I purchased it on Black Friday, when it was marked down to $399.00.  On Cyber Monday, Amazon discounted it to $349.00.  I called and they immediately refunded the difference in those prices, which is typical for Amazon, great customer service.  Loved it.The TV arrived two days later and was a quick and painless install.  I have ATT UVerse and had to change some settings on the ATT receiver box (telling it to send a 1080i video signal, and a full surround audio signal), but we were up and running in 20 minutes.  The picture is fantastic.  The TV was easy to lift and maneuver as well.The only real negatives are the 60Hz refresh rate and the volume.I had hoped to find 120Hz but doesn't seem like Seiki does that with this size, but the price was too good to pass up.  I've watched several football games in HD (I'll never be able to watch them on my standard TV again) and didn't notice any issues with that.  The refresh rate only seems to affect fast action sequences.  You get a bit of tiling.  I first noticed it watching the finale of "The Walking Dead" in a fight scene.  But it wasn't distracting and didn't create a problem for me.The volume on this TV just isn't that loud, but other reviews indicated this so I knew what to expect.  Plus, I'm running the audio through a Pioneer DTS 7.1 receiver anyway (video and audio) so I don't use the TV speakers for anything anyway.  Keep that in mind though if you plan to use this TV's speakers as your primary audio.  They are small, soft, and tinny.Overall, this is a good TV at a phenomenal price.

Reviews.Title: Most bang for your buck!
Reviews.Author: antman04
Reviews.Content: By far the most bang for your buck. For $348 and well shipping free cant really have too much negative feed back for a 46" TV. Ok so the speakers aren't the best in the world, but the picture quality is by far the most clean and amazing look for a 46". So all in all, with price and quality I will def give it a 5 star rating. Feel bad for the people that had some shipping issues / damaged screen. I can say for myself it was fast shipping and a great buy, so grab one while their still in stock!

Reviews.Title: Best TV I found!
Reviews.Author: Tabby
Reviews.Content: Just bought this TV, and it has gone beyond what I expected. Set up was very easy, took maybe 5-10 minutes tops. The sound quality is excellent and the picture is crystal clear. I'm so happy with it and It's a great deal!

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Christopher Navarro
Reviews.Content: Pros:Good Quality for the price  (I paid $349.99 on Black Friday) . 3 HDMIs, easy mounting, decent sound (still sounds a little tinny like all of my other LED tvs.)LightweightSimple setup.Cons:Comcast remote code was missing from the Comcast remote manual...had to get it on google.Comcast HD/DVR kept defaulting at 480i instead of 1080i.....solved via google: had to shut off Scientific Atlantic box...hit menu button until 1080 showed up on the LED display...then press select...turned on and then blamo 1080i.60 Hz refresh obiously less quality than 120 Hz...some tiling on viewing of a blue ray movie (when a lot of action was going on)...no big deal though, most other movies were fine.Overall, very good replacement tv from the tube tv i had in the living room.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Deal!
Reviews.Author: Traci
Reviews.Content: We purchased this on Cyber Monday and it was delivered that Thursday.  Set up was super easy.  Picture and sound are great.  We did need to get blue,yellow, red cords to hook up to our 10 year old dvd player. No problem!!!!  Love it!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: zbeeksma
Reviews.Content: This is my first HDTV but it seems to be an excellent purchase.  Worked right out of the box, and it's great to attach my laptop to.  My blu-ray player came today, so we will see what it does with that.The sound is very tinny, but that is to be expected with such a thin TV.  I bought a soundbar to connect to the TV which remedied that (to be fair my wife didn't realize the sound was poor until we hooked up the soundbar, then she heard a distinct difference).

Reviews.Title: Great TV for price
Reviews.Author: Glenn Lucke
Reviews.Content: This TV is for our bedroom and it is awesome.  Picture quality is great. Sound is so-so.  You can hook up a Stereo System for better sound. Like I did.  But overall it is the best value for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the money
Reviews.Author: Toby Buhr
Reviews.Content: Nice and light. We don't have HD programming yet so I'm sure picture will improve tons, although looks fine already. We mounted on wall so extra nice. Found that I don't have access to some setup options, maybe will change with HD? Also arrived super quick.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price!
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth V. Wills
Reviews.Content: The only complaint I have about this TV is the sound quality.  The  picture quality is outstanding. The sound will need to be upgraded by at least a sound bar but it's not horrible, just really low, even at maximum volume.

Reviews.Title: This TV is AWESOME!!!!
Reviews.Author: Hubby2311
Reviews.Content: When I first got this tv (within 24 hrs. of ordering) and hooked it up which was as easy as it gets I was rather disappointed with the picture until my son hooked up his xbox then WOW what a picture so I called directv to hook up HD and they came out the next day and when I came home there it was the picture quality I wanted it is AWESOME!!! so this tv is not good if you do not HD but awesome if you do and hook it up with hdmi or something. The sound is great and you can see the picture great from any position even pretty much beside it it is great for the price.. The only reason I did not leave 5 stars is that the picture was pretty bad with no hd and using a/v cables.

Reviews.Title: Good tv
Reviews.Author: jeanie
Reviews.Content: Ordered this online after trying and failing to get similar one at store on Black Friday. This tv is ultra-thin. Funtions good for what I wanted and needed. Clear, crisp picture.

Reviews.Title: Seiki TV review
Reviews.Author: S. Roman
Reviews.Content: I recieved quickly within 2 days of ordering, Packaging was well done, TV has GREAT COLOR AND PICTURE QUALITY, I would of given it a 5 star if it wasn't for the AUDIO Quality or lack of. Very low I have it on 100 and it is still low, installing a surround system (luckily we had one) but if u live in a QUITE HOUSEHOLD this should do fine, I DON'T lol GREAT BUY FOR PRICE

Reviews.Title: whelp had to send it back...should have known better
Reviews.Author: Layed BacknCool
Reviews.Content: The First return was a fluke..the coax cable connector to the TV snapped off. I was like no worries stuff happens. Amazon was great as usual  and I got another TV back in less than a week. Well I got the TV and was like cool...the picture is pretty decent,clear,had to make a few adjustments on some shows but movies played great except dark scenes. You have to lighten it up a little to see clearly. I though no biggie, I only paid 350.00 bucks not expecting the  best or the worse. Well.. a couple of weeks went by and I'm seeing these white spots come though in each corner of the TV. You can only see them in dark scenes and when the TV first comes on. I Googled the problem and some reviews. They  said it could be the light generator going bad.But according to Seki techs its called Light Bleed which is common LED TV's and there is nothing that can be done. well yes there is. Buy a more expensive TV. I'm a quality junkie and those spots are getting worse and driving me crazy. If your a person that can deal with shabby sound and the white spots on the TV...then its a decent TV to buy. I just don't want to take another chance of something else happening  because of the Hyundia theory. When those cars first came out in the late 80's early 90's they were a terrible car to  buy, ..but now  they are one of the best Make of cars on the road..and I own another one  with NOOO problems. I think this brand will get better in time  I just don't want to be the test dummy to find out how or when...so Panasonic,Samsung,Vizio,Philips, or what ever brand has  decades of quality service under their belts...I regress..and return unto thee..lolGood luck to Seki..and trust me when I say  this has nothing to do with Amazon...they have been excellent through this whole process and I will continue to shop not only through knowledge...but through trial and error also. This one was an error on me. No biggie..just another learning block to step on...lol  Happy Holidays all my Amazonian co-shoppers!!!!.....

Reviews.Title: good so far.. but..
Reviews.Author: Haitian Manno "Haitianmanno"
Reviews.Content: it's working fine so far..however, when i plug in my iphone in the usb port.. nothing happens.. and the sound isnt that loud.. but for what i paid for it.. i'm satisfied..

Reviews.Title: best tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: fantastic you cant go an past this buy  whit led...its up there whit the big boys ..pic 5 of 5...sound not bad but could be better...other wise buy it ..buy it now ...

Reviews.Title: Seiki SE461TS 46' 1080P 60HZ Slim LED HDTV.
Reviews.Author: Roberto Lopez
Reviews.Content: The Seiki 46'LED 1080p HDTV is a good TV but theTCL 46'LED 1080P HDTV is better. The colors  are verry good and has 3USB ports, 1-more then the TCL. is sheaper to by the Seiki TV then the TCL so for the money it is worth it.

Reviews.Title: ok for the money
Reviews.Author: jgohra
Reviews.Content: For the price it is good.  Reds are on the pinkish side and in order to balance, you have to take the color down to a setting of 38 which is not that great when in dynamic mode. If you are connecting to a surround sound receiver, note that the only audio out is R/L through rca only (No optical or coax). Since it is an LED, you can see the lighting in the corners. Overall cannot complain for a $400 tv.

Reviews.Title: Conflicted
Reviews.Author: Jon Allex
Reviews.Content: Seemed like the deal of a lifetime at that price. Couldn't help but feel a little buyer's remorse post-install, though. Can't evade this creeping realization of a big-screen, HD TV being a purchase that one shouldn't cut cost corners on. Go for the best available product, even if it means paying a little or a lot extra, thus leaving a value option like this by the wayside.It's HD and big, all right. But it has scant customization options, and relative lack of "Wow!" factor. I relished the ability to fine-tune the most idiosyncratic, picture details in my experiences with high-end brands - where the end, viewing result took on a near-religious connotation. With this, it was very sterile and ho-hum. I felt little sense of gratitude for living in an era of advanced electronics.

Reviews.Title: wow what a problem
Reviews.Author: Jean
Reviews.Content: this is not a product i would have my worst enemy  buy the seiki manufactor just wants your money , they dont care if they sold you a tv that only shows 1/2 a screen, i bought for a xmas gift, drive 900 miles to set it up for them, there was only a 1/2 screeni called the manufacturer and they told me they would send a refurbished one i would recieve it in 2 weeks put a hold on my credit card for an extra 500.00 till they get the defected one back, that was dec 27 it is now, january 23, i called them last week and the person on the phone  told me they were really sorry, it been crazy there with there convention, and time off, that they would see why it hasnt been shipped from the warehouse never said they would get ahold of me, now i am out 1000.00 but i do have a tv with 1/2 a screen anyone want it

Reviews.Title: works like a charm
Reviews.Author: danielle
Reviews.Content: this tv was cheaper that my juicy couture pursetotally worth itthe outter part around it looks like black glossy woodsuper clean and 1080 p is great :)

Reviews.Title: Did not meet expectations
Reviews.Author: T Wood
Reviews.Content: I did not have overly high expectations as this was an off brand (you get what you pay for) and not top of the line, however I was not prepared for just how bad this item was.  Stand was poorly made and not stable at all. Picture was absolutely awful.  The good thing is that I purchased through Amazon so return of product was easy and refund was received quickly.  Love Amazon, Hated this TV.

Reviews.Title: Piece of crap
Reviews.Author: Disappointed customer
Reviews.Content: The base of this TV is way too small to support it. We assembled it and the screen basically teetered. It was too much money for it to barely sit on the stand.We still were thinking about keeping it until we went to connect our cable and DVD player; the TV didn't even recognize that anything was hooked up! After 45 minutes on the phone with tech support, it was clear the thing was defective. We now have a 46 inch Sanyo LCD TV for about the same price. It's been awesome and I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: short time of use already present problems
Reviews.Author: Fermin Camejo
Reviews.Content: With only a little more than one month or more of using this TV already shows signs of damage the TV to be turned on for more than 5 hours at a time the screen goes blank and just wait for more than one hour off to bring it back to normally operate a TV that is not worth buying for the short time of use already present problems

Reviews.Title: great product, unbeatable price.
Reviews.Author: johnny quest "curious john"
Reviews.Content: I purchase this tv in amazon for  $349.99  and free supersaver shipping the week before black friday, I'm not consider me a tech expert but I'm pleased with my purchase, besides I buy it as a  gift for my husband and he's a hi-tech aficionado.this tv is not intended for a main set of entertaiment ,'cause we have a full equiped hometheater for that, but for daily use tv he qualifies this set based in it's price a "blow your expectations product" he said, the image is clear and well defined,the colors are pop and balaced, the setup is a breeze and the overal quality of the screen rivalize with top recogniced tv models,the only things he argue is the stability of the base and the quality of sound are the main reasons for the 4 stars rate, but he reply that matters have a simple and chip solution: Wall mounting and add a soundbar.I recomend this product for anyone, for me is a golden nugget for a ridiculous low price.(Oh,by the way I'm the wife of johnny quest "Curious John" I'm using his review site.)

Reviews.Title: This TV is a steal at this price!
Reviews.Author: Marooned "Marooned"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV from Amazon as a X-mas present for my college student son.  He doesn't have it yet but I do (I wanted to inspect it before giving it to him).  UPS delivered it in great shape.  (One man operation): I opened up the box, took the TV out, installed the stand (the base), hooked it up to my cable box and turned it on.  It did the initialization things that TVs do, and then, it was on.  I have been watching it for the past 5 days now, and let me tell you, the picture on this below-$400.00-TV would rival any $1000.00-TV any day, no question about it.  My son is not going to know the name "Seiki" but he's gonna love the picture on this no-name TV.  My son is 19 years old and he's gonna have himself a 46 inch color TV with a picture from heaven.  When I was his age, we had a 25 inch BW console (as big as a washer machine) with a picture from hell.  We've sure come a long way.Anyway, this TV has my highest recommendation.

Reviews.Title: Seiki, a good start.
Reviews.Author: pdbs
Reviews.Content: I normally spend weeks visiting local shops and viewing both features and quality of all cheap and mid-priced products before I buy. I did the same in this case, I did not see this particular model in stores, I probably would have bought it right there, but I saw a smaller Seiki.I compared the luminosity of the Seiki with others like LG, (which I deem good) I found shade, or shadows effects on the screen of those, while on this one luminosity shows even all around the screen. Only when there is not input is there uneven luminosity to be seen.Picture in high def is very bright and vibrant, it has lots of inputs, and it is good at energy saving. The 46" size really feel as if it was around 55" due to the brightness of the screen.I really recommend this tv, specially for that price.The delivery was not as timely as I expected, one day after schedule, and the lack of Federal Express to provide a limited timeframe of hours for delivery. Delivery today means literally that you have to choose between waiting all day for your product, or skip it and do things you have to do, even jobs. I found that to be very unprofessional from part of Fedex.

Reviews.Title: My first 1080P TV
Reviews.Author: Bag
Reviews.Content: The first TV I received had color and ghosting problems and the sound was a little off.  Amazon.com was quick to send me a new one.I did get my replacement, the picture is pretty good, only small complaint is some led bleed on two of the corners and the poor sound.Summary, the TV looks great, the audio really sucks, I am going to find a cheap sound-bar.Edit April 2013:The TV picture has been great, I always use a soundbar with a sub.I am definately glad that I made the purchase, upping to 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Jake
Reviews.Content: Great TV, Great picture, the internal speakers are amazing. I normally have it at less then volume 10 and can hear it great. Gaming on xbox looks epic and HD is sweet. Couldn't be happier and 46" is HUGE.

Reviews.Title: I really wanted to like this budget TV...
Reviews.Author: Colin D. Reints
Reviews.Content: Every since I've been able to purchase my own TV's I have always chosen name brands (Panasonic and Sharp).  I decided I would rather save some money and don't like the bells and whistles the name brand TVs are forcing me to pay for when I would rather hook up a device like an XBOX 360 or an Apple TV to do my "Smart TV" functions.Unfortunately, this Seiki TV had horizontal lines starting about half way down the screen until about the bottom 1/3 of the screen making the television virtually unwatchable.  I have attached a picture in the customer images section to show my problem.  Luckily, Amazon is great and is sending me a replacement with 2 day shipping.I'm still hopeful I just got a defective unit and will update my review if the new Seiki I receive doesn't have any screen issues.  Just be careful when you see a great price with an unknown brand because you might have to go threw a few duds because of quality control concerns.UPDATED:I received my second Seiki TV and am very pleased.  I would have likely rated this 5 stars if I received this TV the first time but have to knock it down a star for the chance you get a dud.  There is noticeable light bleeding on the top corners of the TV but at this price a perfect display cannot be expected.  I also wouldn't complain about the sound on this TV although I have never had any sound system hooked up to any TV so it could just be I haven't been spoiled before.

Reviews.Title: Owned for 4 months...so-so
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: So the install was easy enough.  I mainly wanted an external to my notebook or tablet to stream on.  For this, it's just fine.The only problems I came across was on initial use, it needed a software upgrade (you'll need a memory stick).  Btw, this was after being frustrated to no end on trying to get it just to work.So that worked and I'm off, right?  Well, I don't have a cable box to hook to it.  I used the auto-tuner and then put in my favorites.  Cool, right?  Nope.  The tuner would drop the stations I saved as favorites.  Time Warner's problem?  Maybe.  I don't think so as I can manually go to channels I know were dropped.For what I wanted, it works.  If you have a cable box, probably no problem there.  Just letting people know what they may experience.I bought this from Sears for the same price 4 months ago, btw...

Reviews.Title: I dont even remember ordering this.
Reviews.Author: Dmitry Zaltsman
Reviews.Content: I guess i should pay more attention to what gets ordered on this account. Hope someone in the family enjoys this TV. i haven't heard anyone bitch about it yet. So i am assuming it has performed as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Damaged upon arrival
Reviews.Author: Jin Kook Lee
Reviews.Content: The Seiki TV was purchased for a great price of $344 with no shipping fees or taxes.  The TV arrived within the 2 days that was designated, but had a small puncture in the right side of the box.  This puncture caused the right side to be already damaged when I received the item.  The damage did not affect the actual picture, but it was very disappointing to receive a brand new item already damaged.  I thought about returning the item, but figured that it would be more work than it was worth.  I have had this item for almost 2 months now and I have no complaints otherwise.  Great quality product for the price. However, they could do a better job of protecting it during shipping.

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: Debbie
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV and am so unhappy.  Not only is the picture horrible, the sound is also.  The colors are so off and the sound buzzes.  The only good thing was the set up was quick and easy.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: PDoctor
Reviews.Content: I just got this two days ago and I can safely say that I'm quite pleased with it. I bought it expecting it to be what one would expect when buying a 46" LED tv for $380, which is less than the super sale price at walmart on a 46" Sanyo LCD tv, and I spent the two days waiting for it to arrive hoping I didn't have to deal with some huge downside to it or horrible picture quality or it breaking within 20 minutes as someone else mentioned.
