Luckily, Seiki is one of the few, undiscovered, reasonable, small, electronics companies, and their TVs prove that.The tv itself is very aesthetically pleasing, to the point where I would buy it even if I just wanted something to put on my wall that looks like it cost $1,000 to impress my friends, but moreover, the picture and speaker quality at least rival my old Sanyo LCD television (which was pretty good already, but LED tvs are supposed to have sharper pictures, darker blacks, etc.).I must admit that I am displeased with their programming though; all of the hardware they used seems very high quality, but their volume control, picture control, color settings, splash screen at start up, remote having volume on the right and channel on the left, and a variety of other small nuisances, that make it seem like an unfinished product, render this tv uncompetitive in the name brand market, which must be why it costs less than $400.All in all, well worth the cost, but don't buy this if you expect name-brand-quality features.

Reviews.Title: It said 3D
Reviews.Author: Kima
Reviews.Content: But its not 3D,, but something in it is called 3d?? I do not know anything about this kind of thing n I thought there was only 1 kind of 3d..

Reviews.Title: It'll do....
Reviews.Author: Heather M. Ryntz
Reviews.Content: Chose this tv for size and price point... were in a pinch when pixels started going out quickly on our current tv.It's ok.... Sound is not as good as our Samsung was, my husband says it sounds more like my son's 20-something inch tv. I find it to be a big wobbly on it's stand. DEFINITELY not as stable as our Samsung. Definitely doesn't feel as durable either, more like plastic.So far (we got it delivered today) the picture is good, no complaint there. Easy to set up and get running. Wouldn't go out of my way to sing it's praises in recommendation to anyone I knew that could afford something better..... but it works for us being in a pinch and I would recommend it for anyone else looking for a decent tv for a decent price.

Reviews.Title: Vertical Blue Line
Reviews.Author: Chris P. Gainer "Chris Gainer"
Reviews.Content: First of all - amazon is great.  Delivered 16 hours from order placement with 2 day shipping.Now for the bad news - upon powering the unit on, a vertical blue line is displayed on the right third of the screen.  I am going to give Seiki another chance since Amazon's replacement policy is so easy.  I was a bit skeptical, so I purchased it with my amex platinum card to extend the warranty an extra year.

Reviews.Title: Broken TV
Reviews.Author: Angel
Reviews.Content: First, I was supposed to have two-day shipping and I received the package two days late from FedEx. Second, after I set up the TV and turned it on, the display is completely broken. To me it seems like it got dropped somewhere along the line and now all it shows are white and green vertical and horizontal lines. I am incredibly disappointed.

Reviews.Title: This is a must buy!
Reviews.Author: Eric Himes
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV from an upgrade to a 34 inch tube HDTV.  I was told from several people if I upgraded my TV I would get laid. This TV does not disappoint, I got laid within the next 2 days of buying this TV. If you are down on your luck and don't know what to do, don't be suckered in to those pick up artist techniques. Buy this TV and you will get some action quick!  The picture is good and it drops the ladies pants quickly!  I am telling you that this thing is an instant lady magnet, if you live in a high populated area like me you will have women lining up outside your house!  I can't figure out if it is a scent that the TV gives off or what buy this thing is great, I am thinking about getting a second one for my other room to intensify the experience.

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: Gregory Brown
Reviews.Content: Its not a TV especially for the price I paid about $300 I think definitely not top of the line though

Reviews.Title: Screws are weak
Reviews.Author: Debora19
Reviews.Content: Weak screws cant unscrew anymore... I want to return this tv... I didnt even try to turn the tv on

Reviews.Title: ive had better
Reviews.Author: Brian McGrath the Carny
Reviews.Content: Greetings fellow amazonians I picked this up this week on my way out of the backwoods of nevada. It was a good deal so I said what the hey and jumped on it. First off set up was a breeze so that was good, but the issue came from using it. First off my trailermate mongo has fallen for kim kardashian and wants to spend all day watching her show over and over again. He even picked up bootleg copies of her show so in the one hour that it wasn't on tv he could continue to watch her. Then eugene has started fighting with mongo because he wants to play call of duty black opps 2 on the tv (you may have seen him on the commercial he wore a wig and dropped the bombs on the russian dude). And if eugene is in the middle of a mission then mongo starts to bang his head into the wall and yell "Kim! Kim! I need to see you!" Because of all this I think I may just leave the stupid tv on the side of highway 66 and go back to using my old black and white zenith. Thanks amazon for starting a fight in my trailer.
